title: Recontre
creator_credit: Laurent Coderre, Margaret Pettigrew and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Cardboard cutouts explode, twirl, disintegrate and form shapes in a delightful, airy film that describes man’s initiation to life, his journey through it, with its inevitable ups and downs, and his final triumph as the person he struggled to become. Music by Sharon Smith.
